name: Wikan House
address: Br triwangsa, Macang, Kec. Bebandem, Kabupaten Karangasem, Bali 80861, Indonesia
review 1:
Wikan House is a true delight! The room's unique design adds to its charm, and the owner and his family are incredibly friendly and helpful. They provided delicious meals and even went the extra mile by giving me a headlight and a takeaway breakfast before my trip to Mount Agung. They also assisted me in planning my further travels.
If you plan to hike Mount Agung from here, please be aware that some roads there may be in poor condition, so plan accordingly.
All in all, my stay at Wikan House was fantastic, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a welcoming and memorable experience.
review 2:
Wikan House is an amazing place to stay.
The host Family is extremely helpful and kind.
They also have delicious balinese food there.
We had a great time at this place and the room was beautiful.
review 3: Initially I book only 2 nights, but 1 extended to become 4 nights. The room is cleaned everyday. The family  is very nice and warm and the breakfast is delicious. The toilet is outside and no heater, buy these are not big concern for me. Hopefully to come back again when I explore Karangasem region
review 4: Putra and his fabulous family welcomed me warmly and made me feel part of their family. I had the opportunity to share with them the local food (putra is a great cooküòÑ) and i was lucky to participate in the preparation of gifts for the celebration of the full moon with with Radna (Putras wife) and the other women of the village of Macang, we made flowers and other figures built with a kind of colored paste. Putra also offered to be my guide taking me to visit many temples (lampuyang, tirta gangga, house of the king, bat cave and more) including a special trekking in the beautiful local rice fields a few minutes from home and a free coffee tasting. What to say.. memorable experience, i will never forget you‚ô•Ô∏è I will return to 100%
review 5: Best homestay in bali great host greetings from finland
